attributes.additional_details:
Inheritance tax in many cases is a second tax on money that has already been taxed.
 
The inability to pass on the full value of one's savings, investments and property is adversely affecting a huge number of people.
attributes.background: We want the Government to abolish this tax, which we believe is draconian and unfair.
